title: Child and Youth Worker
description: Provide trauma-informed, 24/7 residential support within a structured, rights-based care environment.
qualifications: Diploma/Degree in Child and Youth Care or related field
First Aid/CPR and PMAB or equivalent
applicationInstructions: Submit your resume and cover letter to careers@josmiancare.com with subject 'Child and Youth Worker'.

title: Program Supervisor
description: Lead multidisciplinary teams, ensure compliance, and drive outcomes across group home programs.
qualifications: 5+ years in child and youth service leadership
Knowledge of Ministry standards and trauma-informed practice
Strong communication and case management skills
applicationInstructions: Apply via the website form or email careers@josmiancare.com.

title: Therapeutic Clinician (Contract)
description: Deliver clinical assessments and therapeutic interventions for youth across programs.
applicationInstructions: Include portfolio of case summaries and availability in your application.
